perturbation.original_text: MMMW will provide on-call service for the Technical Infrastructure during the term of this Agreement from 7:00am to 5:00pm CST, with a guaranteed response time of 3 hours with a goal of on site within 2 hours. Support to include 7X24 hour pager support for emergency services. After the customer has 30 locations, MMMW will locate technical personnel in the current geography. If a system is not able to be on-line after hours, on-site help will be made available.
perturbation.changed_text: MMMW will provide on-call service for the Technical Infrastructure during the term of this Agreement from 9:00am to 3:00pm CST, with a guaranteed response time of 5 hours with a goal of on site within 4 hours. Support includes only standard business hours for pager support for emergency services. After the customer has 50 locations, MMMW will locate technical personnel in the current geography. If a system is not able to be on-line after hours, on-site help might be made available based on technician availability.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces conflict by altering the 'on-call service' hours, response times, pager support conditions and conditions to have on-site help. The original version promises more extensive support than the modified version. This creates uncertainty and dispute potential.

perturbation.original_text: Charges will be invoiced and are payable within thirty (30) days after the date of the invoice. All charges are subject to change by MMMW for the forthcoming period capped at the CPI annually, on thirty days written notice. MMMW reserves the right to apply [*] finance charges.
perturbation.changed_text: Charges will be invoiced and are payable within sixty (60) days after the date of the invoice. All charges are subject to change by MMMW at their discretion, with a 10% increase annually, on fifteen days written notice. MMMW reserves the right to apply [*] finance charges.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces conflict by altering the days to pay the invoice, the charges can be changed at their discretion now, the CPI is now 10% increase and the written notice period has changed. The original version has a more restricted price change than the modified version. This creates uncertainty and dispute potential.

perturbation.original_text:
MMMW warrants that the Technical Infrastructure remains in satisfactory operating condition provided it is:

               1) continuously subject to MMMW's inspection and acceptance of the hardware for service; and

               2) subject to normal use and conditions. MMMW's sole and exclusive obligation under this warranty shall be at its option to repair or exchange any hardware not in satisfactory operating condition. Said obligation shall be subject to the conditions and charges of Section 3, 4 and 5 and the prompt submission of (or notification to MMMW of the problem) the hardware to MMMW for service.
perturbation.changed_text:
MMMW warrants that the Technical Infrastructure remains in satisfactory operating condition regardless of whether it is:

               1) continuously subject to MMMW's inspection and acceptance of the hardware for service; and

               2) subject to normal use and conditions. MMMW's sole and exclusive obligation under this warranty shall be the Customer's responsibility to handle issues themselves.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces conflict by removing conditions of warranty, and changing 'MMMW's sole and exclusive obligation' to 'Customer's responsibility to handle issues themselves.' This makes the warranty conditions conflicting and uncertain, leading to potential disputes over responsibility for repairs.
